Detailed Description

CAL Video Port configuration control.

struct vpsissCalVPort

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::enable

TRUE, enables stream on Video Port input

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::freeRun

TRUE enables the pixel clock during idle period. FALSE gates the same.

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::fsReset

TRUE ReSet the timing generator FSM on every end of frame received, otherwise data processed normally

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::pixClock

Configure the pixel clock required. When disabled pixlClock will be 0x0.

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::rdyThr

Configure the initial threashold value, before the first pixel is recevied and passed for furthure proessing

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::width

0, indicates 1 pixel / clock cycle. Else 2 pixels / clock cycle

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::xBlk

Configures the X blank to be inserted at end of line

uint32_t vpsissCalVPort::yBlk

Configure the Y Blank to be inserted at end of frame
